Name: TemporaryLocalFolder
Description: Folder where the job will store its files (split files or downloaded files when using actions)

Name: ReceiptsTrainingFolder
Description: Path for ML model training - Receipts

Name: InvoicesTrainingFolder
Description: Path for ML model training - Invoices

Name: AutomaticallySplitPDFs
Description: Parameter dictating whether PDFs containing multiple documents should automatically be split into multiple files or not (setting is case-insensitive)

Name: ActionFolderPath
Description: Path to the Orchestrator Folder where the Action Catalog resides

Name: StorageBucketName
Description: Storage Bucket Name (required when Action Center is used)

Name: StorageBucketDirectoryPath
Description: Path inside  the Storage Bucket where actions will store the files

Name: DocumentUnderstandingQueueName
Description: The name of the Orchestrator Queue

Name: DocumentUnderstandingQueuePath
Description: Path to the Orchestrator Folder where the Queue resides

Name: ClassifierLearningFilePath
Description: Path to the learning file of the classifier

Name: IntelligentFormExtractorEndpoint
Description: UiPath public endpoint for Intelligent Form Extractor
